items.content_html:
Microblogvember is over and so is the daily pressure to post.

I have always wanted to blog but never thought I had much to say. After re-reading these posts I am hoping this challenge and will keep my on the path and maybe, someday there will be something worth reading.
items.content_text:
[Microblogvember](https://micro.blog/discover/mbnov) is over and so is the daily pressure to post.

I have always wanted to blog but never thought I had much to say.  After re-reading these [posts](https://jomalo.com/categories/microblogvember/) I am hoping this challenge and will keep my on the path and maybe, someday there will be something worth reading.

items.content_html: Sharing my home screens after seeing a couple here this morning‚Ä¶
items.content_text: Sharing my home screens after seeing a couple here this morning‚Ä¶

items.content_html:
WANTED: Someone to go back in time with me. This is not a joke. You’ll get paid after we get back. Must bring your own weapons.
I have only done this once before.

SAFETY NOT GUARANTEED
items.content_text:
> WANTED: Someone to go back in time with me. This is not a joke. You'll get paid after we get back. Must bring your own weapons.  
> I have only done this once before.  

*SAFETY* NOT GUARANTEED

items.content_html:
Otto West

Nice fish, Ken. You know what Nietzsche said about animals? “They were God’s second blunder.
items.content_text:
Otto West

> Nice *fish*, Ken. You know what Nietzsche said about animals? "They were God's second blunder.

items.content_html:
Jerry Smith

Is this what it’s like to trend?
items.content_text:
Jerry Smith

> Is this what it's like to *trend*?

items.content_html: Looking for motivation to focus when there is too much to do. The countertop for the new island will be ready this week. Still a few things to do before we are ready for it.
items.content_text: Looking for *motivation* to focus when there is too much to do. The countertop for the new island will be ready this week. Still a few things to do before we are ready for it.

items.content_html: Two new courses purchased this weekend for Web and iOS Development. A new commitment to myself to expand my skills over the winter.
items.content_text: Two new courses purchased this weekend for Web and iOS Development. A new *commitment* to myself to expand my skills over the winter.

items.content_html: Even though we shutdown the trailer weeks ago, it is hard to get over our Friday night ritual of jumping in the truck and heading out as soon as we get home from work.
items.content_text: Even though we shutdown the trailer weeks ago, it is hard to get over our Friday night *ritual* of jumping in the truck and heading out as soon as we get home from work.

items.content_html: My ability to retain information the moment I have switched tabs, or programs, or rooms seems to be slipping.
items.content_text: My ability to *retain* information the moment I have switched tabs, or programs, or rooms seems to be slipping.

items.content_html: I recently pulled the pin on an update to the Apple Watch Ultra. Moving from my Series 3, anything would have been better but the extra battery life, larger size and more durable case were the biggest draws for me.
items.content_text: I recently pulled the pin on an *update* to the Apple Watch Ultra. Moving from my Series 3, anything would have been better but the extra battery life, larger size and more durable case were the biggest draws for me.

items.content_html: In my younger days I used to work as a line cook in a busy restaurant. No real chance for a break so we would graze on our shift on “mistakes”. Oops… extra chicken fingers were prepared or I thought you ordered 2 cheeseburgers.
items.content_text: In my younger days I used to work as a line cook in a busy restaurant. No real chance for a break so we would *graze* on our shift on "mistakes". Oops... extra chicken fingers were prepared or I thought you ordered 2 cheeseburgers.

items.content_html: First snow fall of the season. No real accumulation but I had to clear ice from the truck windows this morning.
items.content_text: First snow fall of the season. No real accumulation but I had to clear *ice* from the truck windows this morning.

items.content_html: I find myself stuck in a loop. Every year as winter approaches I say to myself: I want to learn to code, I start some training, realize I don’t have the time, repeat.
items.content_text: I find myself stuck in a loop. Every year as winter approaches I say to myself: I want to learn to code, I start some training, realize I don't have the time, *repeat*.

items.content_html: I find it really hard to pick up a new novel once I am finishing reading it. I become a little too invested in the story and characters.
items.content_text: I find it really hard to pick up a new *novel* once I am finishing reading it. I become a little too invested in the story and characters.

items.content_html: Winter tire change over always seems to gets put off just long enough to run out of days with reasonable temperatures. The last few weekends were in the mid to high teens, now we are hovering just above freezing. There is no heated shop, there is no shop, just the driveway.
items.content_text: Winter *tire* change over always seems to gets put off just long enough to run out of days with reasonable temperatures.  The last few weekends were in the mid to high teens, now we are hovering just above freezing. There is no heated shop, there is no shop, just the driveway.

items.content_html: I have always been interested in my family genealogy. Years ago I found someone who was offering whiskey barrel staves customized with your family crest and family tree. Looking for my own staves so I can try and make my own.
items.content_text: I have always been interested in my family genealogy. Years ago I found someone who was offering whiskey *barrel* staves customized with your family crest and family tree. Looking for my own staves so I can try and make my own.

items.content_html: Really enjoying Andor, the latest instalment of the Star Wars franchise.
items.content_text: Really enjoying Andor, the latest instalment of the Star Wars *franchise*.

items.content_html:
Wintersleep - Drunk on Aluminum

Wild eyes, I feel the teeth again
Gnawing and imminent
In the lost, lonely night
Oh my, give me the words again
Paint it aluminum
Make it white, make it white
items.content_text:
[Wintersleep - Drunk on Aluminum](https://music.apple.com/ca/album/drunk-on-aluminum/714649371?i=714649503)  

> Wild eyes, I feel the teeth again  
> Gnawing and imminent  
> In the lost, lonely night  
> Oh my, give me the words again  
> Paint it aluminum  
> Make it white, make it white

items.content_html: Wanting to goto bed but have to leave for the airport. My daughter’s friend, last years college roommate, flies in late and needs a ride to residence.
items.content_text: Wanting to goto bed but have to *leave* for the airport. My daughter's friend, last years college roommate, flies in late and needs a ride to residence.

items.content_html: Picked up a new airless paint sprayer this week. I need to adjust to the new way, it took longer to set up and clean up than it did to paint. the finished product is so much better than a brush and roller.
items.content_text: Picked up a new airless paint sprayer this week. I need to *adjust* to the new way, it took longer to set up and clean up than it did to paint. the finished product is so much better than a brush and roller.

items.content_html: Night number two of Leafs games and I have the suspicion I am in for another long season.
items.content_text: Night number two of Leafs games and I have the *suspicion* I am in for another long season.

items.content_html: The Leafs game on one display and a little work from home after-hours maintenance on the other.
items.content_text: The Leafs game on one *display* and a little work from home after-hours maintenance on the other.

items.content_html: In my early teens I met the Canadian Prime Minister with the second shortest-tenure. My summer vacation was almost longer than he lasted in office.
items.content_text: In my early teens I met the Canadian Prime *Minister* with the second shortest-tenure. My summer vacation was almost longer than he lasted in office.

items.content_html: Nothing is certain when you remodel, a two week timeline can turn into two months in the blink of an eye.
items.content_text: Nothing is *certain* when you remodel, a two week timeline can turn into two months in the blink of an eye.

items.content_html: We are updating our kitchen and trying to choose a new paint color for the cabinets. The only consensus we have is that, as a family, we do not have a consensus.
items.content_text: We are updating our kitchen and trying to choose a new paint color for the cabinets. The only *consensus* we have is that, as a family, we do not have a *consensus*.

items.content_html:
InSight’s Final Selfie

NASA’s InSight Mars lander took this final selfie on April 24, 2022, the 1,211th Martian day, or sol, of the mission. The lander is covered with far more dust than it was in its first selfie, taken in December 2018, not long after landing…
items.content_text:
[*InSight*'s Final Selfie](https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/images/pia25287-insights-final-selfie)

> NASA's InSight Mars lander took this final selfie on April 24, 2022, the 1,211th Martian day, or sol, of the mission. The lander is covered with far more dust than it was in its first selfie, taken in December 2018, not long after landing...

items.content_text: Can I join the club?

items.content_html: Spent the day working on a new kitchen island. Almost ready for the new countertop. Wish I was exempt from the regular days chores.
items.content_text: Spent the day working on a new kitchen island. Almost ready for the new countertop. Wish I was *exempt* from the regular days chores.

Between flattery and admiration there often flows a river of contempt.

  • Minna Antrim

items.content_html:
Thinking back to my younger days, I had the opportunity to get my pilots license for free.

My younger self was not so smart.
items.content_text:
Thinking back to my younger days, I had the opportunity to get my pilots *license* for free.  

My younger self was not so smart.

items.content_html:
Starting preparations for our first Boxing Day feast since Covid shut us down. A full breakfast for 40-60 family and close friends.

We even have staff shirts made up with a family crest, modified for the occasion.
items.content_text: Starting preparations for our first Boxing Day *feast* since Covid shut us down. A full breakfast for 40-60 family and close friends. We even have staff shirts made up with a family crest, modified for the occasion.

The Mafia of the Acting WorldSource: Hollywood‚Äôs Secret Loop Groups: ‚ÄúThe Mafia of the Acting World‚Äù ‚Äì The Hollywood Reporter
